Thanks very much, man! It was a little more work than other cracks I've done, but very well worth it!!

downloaded no problem. updated my host file no problem. but when i tried to run the MasterCollection_CS5_LS1 application it gave me an error message "The file archive part of Adobe CS5 Master Collection is missing".  what gives?

I found that I was able to use this in sandbox made using Comodo Firewall and it prevented it from checking the activation, instead I could skip the adobe id process altogether with no problem whatsoever.
